### Read Some Papers

For the readings below, <b>no posts</b> are required:

```{r echo=FALSE}

paper <- tibble(
  
  title = c("<i>Classical Test Theory</i>",
             "<i>Processes and Procedures for Estimating Score Reliability and Precision</i>",
             "<i>Counselor Competence, Performance Assessment, and Program Evaluation</i>"
  ),
  
  Source = c("Desjardins & Bulut (2018)",
             "Bardhoshi & Erford (2017)",
             "Tate, Bloom, Tassara & Caperton (2014)"),
  
  Arrow = c("internal",
            "internal",
            "internal"),
  
  Post = c("<i>none</i>",
          "<i>none</i>",
          "<i>none</i>"
          ),
  
  Channel = c("<i>not applicable</i>",
              "<i>not applicable</i>",
              "<i>not applicable</i>"
              ),
  
  Icon = c(NA, 
           NA,
           NA),

  Site = c(
    "",
    "",
    ""
  ),
  
  .name_repair = "minimal"
  
)

```

<center>
```{r, echo=FALSE}
paper %>%
  mutate(Icon = case_when(
    str_detect(`Icon`, "slack") ~ '<img src="/logos/slack-ico.png" alt="Slack icon" width="25px">',
    str_detect(`Icon`, "ecampus") ~ '<img src="/logos/wvu-gold-ico.png" alt="WVU icon" width="25px">',
    str_detect(`Icon`, "library") ~ '<img src="/logos/library-ico.png" alt="Library icon" width="25px">',
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(Arrow = case_when(
    str_detect(`Arrow`, "external") ~ '<div style="font-size: 0.5rem;"><i class="fa fa-external-link fa-2x" aria-hidden="true" style="color:#559977"></i></div>',
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(Site = na_if(Site, "")) %>%
  mutate(Link = case_when(
    !is.na(Icon) ~ paste0("<a href=",Site," target='_blank'>",Icon,"</a>"),
    is.na(Icon) ~ '<img src="/logos/none-ico.png" alt="Library icon" width="25px">',
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(Channel = paste0("<span style='font-size:18px'>",Channel,"</span></a>")) %>%
  select(-Icon, -Site, -Arrow) %>% 
  mutate_all(replace_na,"") %>%
  kbl(col.names = c("Title", "Paper", "Question", "Post", "Link"), 
      "html", 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'llccc') %>%
  kable_paper(full_width = TRUE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "20em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "15em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(4, width = "10em") %>% 
  column_spec(5, width = "5em") %>% 
  row_spec(0:3, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;', color = "#f7f7f7", background = "transparent") %>%
  column_spec(4, width = "10em", color = "#ff8384") 
```
</center>

### Read Some Text

```{r echo=FALSE}

document <- as.character(fa("file", fill = "#e86af0", height = "25px"))

book <- as.character(fa("book", fill = "#f06ab5", height = "25px"))

site <- as.character(fa("link", fill = "	#a56af0", height = "25px"))

review <- tibble(
  
  source <- c("<i>Quantitative Research Designs</i>",
              "<i>Measurement, Scales, and Scoring</i>"
              ),
  
  section = c("Chapters 5-6 (Part II)",
              "Chapter II"),
  
  link <- c(
    paste0("[",site,"]",
    "(https://www.thetaminusb.com/intro-measurement-r/measurement.html){target='_blank'}"
    ),
    paste0("[",book,"]",
    "(https://ebookcentral.proquest.com/lib/wvu/detail.action?docID=4722459){target='_blank'}"
    )

  ),
  
  .name_repair = "minimal"
  
)

```

<center>
```{r, echo=FALSE}
review %>%
  mutate_all(replace_na,"") %>%
  kbl(col.names = c("Title", 
                    "Section",
                    "Link"), 
      "html", 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'llc') %>%
   kable_paper(full_width = TRUE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "15em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "10em") %>% 
  column_spec(3, width = "5em") %>%
  row_spec(0:2, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;', color = "#f7f7f7", background = "transparent") 
```
</center>
